name: Cheryl Storms
text: Of all prices and pizzas this place is Great.  Wonderful customer service .. great Pizza.. reasonable lunch specials

name: emily onestar
text: The staff was super nice and the food was good. A little burnt but still yummy. Would have been nice to have a menu on the wall to look at instead of a menu I had to look for.

name: Casey Koerner
text: Round Table has an insane deal for all you can eat pizza on weekdays, and Tuesday nights.  Best pizza in town, buffet includes salad bar and dessert twists.  They always accommodate my request for vegetarian.  Always nice people.

name: iHATE googleplus
text: Passable?  Competent?  Either way, it is basically just Pizza Hut food for MASSIVELY too high a price, and a horrible beverage selection. …More

name: blackcloud 048
text: Service was terrible. Don't get delivered from them. Put on hold for over 29 mins. Stated their extremely busy. Went in and found them ignoring phone orders and doing there own thing.Not busy at all... Not a good way to run a business. They lost my business. I rather go to another Round table.

name: Lindsey Elmquist
text: Wish I could give it zero. Came in to order and was told by three people “I’ll be right with you.” Waited at the counter when a women finally came up and was not only rude but denied me a beer because their sign (for legal drinking age) was …More

name: Linda Coukoulis
text: My husband and I  haven't been to Round Table for awhile. We went in and ordered our usual medium ham, bell pepper and olive thick crust pizza. They only have thick crust for large and up! We can't eat a large! So we had to get the thin crust! What a shame, we won't be going back!

name: Taylor Abshire
text: It's a great place to eat with  your family. Pizza is always a great choice. Salad bar is awesome. Love the variety of topping choices.

name: Sisan Katz
text: Great pizza buffet ! Love their cinnamon sticks and nice salad bar.

name: Judi Lietz
text: Very friendly staff and excellent service. Pizza's are always fresh and hot when I have it delivered or if I pick it up. Highly recommend.

name: Brittany Stroy
text: Customer service was great but my mini corn from the salad bar tasted like it was fermented.

name: Cathy Portner
text: Great food , fast and friendly service plenty of seating lots of parking

name: Mike Clemmer
text: Thank you round table for the best pizza in Sacramento

name: Robert Maybie
text:
I come here twice a month for a business networking event (Successful Thinkers, every 1st and 3rd Tuesday at 11:30) and I must say that I really like it.
Not only is Round Table Pizza one of my favorite places to eat pizza, but their …More

name: William Freeman
text: Best pizza I have ever had and will stay a loyal customer for I have never had any  better pizza than the ones I get from round table period. I guess you will have to see for yourself and your family for I garentee you won't be disappointed

name: Thomas Bloom
text: Great pizza some of the salad bar was sad. Managers need to communicate and mark off reservations, just a hassle to move my family of 6 to smaller tables

name: Publio Jimenez
text: Great time cozy spot for the family the pizza was great

name: imuserable
text: I've tried darn near every R.T. in the Sacramento area. While I have never been disappointed, there are two that seem to consistently create a superior "pie". One is located downtown (galleria) the other one, my personal favorite, it's located next to Safeway on Madison and Dewey in Fair Oaks.

name: Stefany Simpson
text: The round table on manzanita make the pizza way better. This round table makes pizza sloppy.

name: The Chiri Family
text: Amazing pizza. Amazing food and salad. Amazing staff. Staff are very assistave and friendly. Even though they messed up my order, they managed to make it up in very professional way. Plus you can always use coupons to save on yiu meals and pizzas. So thats great.

name: Altamar Guzman
text: Worst service ever didn't even get to taste the pizza it was so bad.

name: Joe Johnston
text: Nice place to eat, fast service, friendly staff.

name: Jackie Castelluccio
text: It was an excellent experiences!!! Would definitely go back!!!❤❤

name: Lisa Knight
text: Round table used to be my go to pizza place it just seems over priced for average pizza. Even thier new offerings fall flat on flavor. We had the West coast combo it was over thought and we didn't like the balsamic drizzle over it.

name: Samuel Bagoon
text: Great pizza fast and good service!!

name: Melissa Codde
text: They were very busy, but service with a smile and quick as they could be

name: Kathy Strom
text: Love their pizza can't get enough of it very Nice staff always get great service when dining in or taking home just wish they were opened later and a little cheaper!
